tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ab_testing_messages (
    test_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    message TEXT,
    design TEXT,
    audience_size INT,
    conversion_rate FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE test_results (
    test_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    message_id UUID,
    design_id UUID,
    variant VARCHAR,
    conversion_rate FLOAT,
    test_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE test_results (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  group_id INT,
  message_id INT,
  design_id INT,
  conversion_rate FLOAT
);
CREATE TABLE marketing_message (   message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   message_text TEXT,   message_type VARCHAR(50),   group_id INT,   experiment_date DATE );
CREATE TABLE design_options (   design_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   design_name VARCHAR(50),   design_image BLOB,   design_type VARCHAR(50),   group_id INT );
CREATE TABLE experimental_groups (   group_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   group_name VARCHAR(50),   group_description TEXT );
CREATE TABLE experiment_results (   result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   experiment_date DATE,   group_id INT,   message_id INT,   design_id INT,   conversion_rate FLOAT );
